text:
@RandPaul @NYGovCuomo wait for it... 

kentucky is nowhere near getting #COVID19 under control (and with its senators clearly prioritizing their allegiance to @realDonaldTrump over #Kentucky lives/health or SCIENCE) #CoronavirusOutbreak is bound to get far worse
